You never want to get stranded on the side of the road during a natural disaster. Luckily the @TxDPS has a hotline just in case you find yourself in a worst-case scenario! Dial 1-800-525-5555 to get connected or visit this link to learn more: https://t.co/BVIg5H7Gr1 https://t.co/L4t0dXXMa7

In case of evacuation it is always good to know how the roads are looking. Call 1-800-452-9292 to get up to date with @TxDOT statewide road closures and highway conditions. You can also visit this link for more information: https://t.co/PmO4NJBXKR https://t.co/orvixagcKs
